statusCheckMsg.checking: Checking the status of the server!

Intro.cardExplanation:
The Political Disposition Discriminator has two sections.
The left section randomly presents news for you to comment on.
The right section allows you to write comments about the news.
Intro.self: Let's take a look at the political bias discriminator.
Intro.getStarted: Now, shall we analyze your political orientation? Please click me!
